comment.author: Corinne
comment.text: This could break the 116K record, share! I shared for the first time with my family against me. Be brave, let's stand together!

replies.author: Corinne
replies.text: Andrew Thank you so much! It was wonderful to be with persons such as yourself that share my hopes for this country.

replies.author: Andrew
